sections.title: Details
content: It is a shayari, poetry, storytelling, monologue and standup comedy competition.

sections.title: Structure
content: The contestants are required to perform a set of 2 minutes maximum.
The performers who get selected will move on to the next round.
Participants can perform their set with an instrument with a prop.
Shortlisted participants in this round will have to perform in front of the judges.
They can perform their old version or can perform a new one altogether.

sections.title: Rules and Guidelines
content: This competition is strictly for the students of COEP Technological University.
Exceeding the allotted time may result in a penalty or disqualification.
Content must be respectful and suitable for a college audience.
Profanity, hate speech, or offensive remarks of any kind will not be tolerated.
Performances promoting political, religious, or controversial views should be avoided.
Participants must report at least [30 minutes] prior to the event start time to confirm attendance.
The decision of the judges will be final and binding. Participation implies acceptance of all event rules and guidelines.
